meanings.definition: Bairnliest: superlative form of bairn, meaning most childlike or resembling a child
meanings.sent1: The puppy's playful and bairnliest behavior brought joy to the family.
meanings.sent2: The bairnliest drawings on the wall were done by the youngest artist in the class.
meanings.sent3: The bairnliest giggles erupted from the room as the children played hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: Her bairnliest innocence shone through her wide eyes and carefree laughter.
meanings.sent5: The bairnliest smile lit up the room, spreading happiness to all who saw it.

meanings.definition: Bairnliest: in a manner characteristic of a child or children
meanings.sent1: She skipped bairnliest down the path, her laughter echoing in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The children played bairnliest in the park, running and laughing without a care.
meanings.sent3: He sang bairnliest while swinging on the swing, delighting everyone around.
meanings.sent4: The puppy wagged its tail bairnliest, excited to see its favorite toy.
meanings.sent5: The siblings danced bairnliest around the living room, lost in their own world of joy.
